heading: HR02515
0: A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE COLLECTIVE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONGRATULATE BROTHER EDUARDO V. MANALO FOR HIS FIRST DECADE OF VICTORIOUS CHURCH ADMINISTRATION AS HE MARKS HIS 10TH ANNIVERSARY AS THE EXECUTIVE MINISTER OF THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO ON SEPTEMBER 7, 2019
